title: Oops! After Brutally Attacking Trump, Glenn Beck Has Two Embarrassing Words for Trump Supporters… | Alternative
text:
(Before It's News)
By Lisa Haven
This just in from Gary Franchi’s Next News Network , Former Fox news anchor, Glenn Beck, decided he had some “special words” for Donald Trumps supporters. After brutally attacking President Trump since his campaign run to the current date, Glenn, has finally come out with two powerful words. I believe you’ll find them worthwhile to hear. Here’s the breaking report….
